choices.choiceText: No, this is for a new customer.

fields.name: AccProfSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Thank you. A new Account Profile has been created for {!AccountRecord.Name}.

fields.name: AccProfUpdateSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Thank you. The Account Profile has been successfully updated.

fields.name: Do_you_have_preliminary_access_information
fields.fieldText: Do you have preliminary access information?

fields.name: Display_Competitor
fields.fieldText: The account selected is a competitor account. Please select an active customer or prospect account and try again.

fields.name: Completion_Text
fields.fieldText:
Thanks!


﻿Initial Sales information has been completed. You can return to the record at any time in the sales process to update sales information. Once complete, select the Approval Process button on the Opportunity to continue with next steps.

fields.name: Text_Contacts_Associated
fields.fieldText: What are the contacts associated with this account?

fields.name: I_also_need_to_create_new_contact_s
fields.fieldText: I also need to create new contact(s)

fields.name: RB_Create_Oppty
fields.fieldText: Would you like to create an opportunity for this account? If there are already opportunities associated, you can also select those.

fields.name: DT_PreexistingOpptys
fields.fieldText: If you'd like to choose a preexisting opportunity, you will have the option to select the opportunity on the next screen. If there are any preexisting opportunities, they will be displayed in the table below:

fields.name: RB_Oppty_Products
fields.fieldText: Would you like to associate opportunity products at this time?

fields.name: AccountProfileSelectionDisplayText
fields.fieldText: If you'd like to work off of one of the Account Profiles listed below, please select it. Otherwise, you can just click Next to create a new Account Profile for {!AccountRecord.Name}.

fields.name: CurrentCustomerQuestion
fields.fieldText: Are you looking to make changes to the current customer record?

fields.name: AccountProfileVerificationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please verify the information below is up to date.

fields.name: Display_InactiveAcct
fields.fieldText: The account selected is currently inactive. Please select an active customer or prospect account and try again.

fields.name: AccountProfTitle
fields.fieldText: If applicable, add a brief title for this Account Profile

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a title that is {!AccountProfNameAvailableCharacters} characters or fewer.

fields.name: Please_fill_out_access_information
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the following access information:

fields.name: Please_fill_out_SOW
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the following for Scope of Work:

fields.name: Please_Verify_Correct
fields.fieldText: Please verify that the following information is correct; otherwise, please update as necessary:

fields.name: Please_fill_out_addtl_info_opptyproduct
fields.fieldText: Please fill out additional information for the following opportunity product: {!For_Each_Product_Selected.Name}:

fields.name: RB_Are_you_ready_to_fill_out_the_Scope_of_Work
fields.fieldText: Are you ready to fill out the Scope of Work?
